caption.p: Detection of DNA damage caused by Lippia citriodora oil and citral in Jurkat cells using comet assay. Jurkat cells (2 × 10 4) were incubated with Lippia citriodora oil ( A) or citral ( B) for 20 min at room temperature. Results are shown as Mean ± S.D. * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001.
